message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $100 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value to you, but I believe I can find something similar at a lower price elsewhere. I'm willing to pay $85 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $92.50. This is still a good deal for both of us, and it reflects the value of the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility, but I'm still looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose $87.50 for the product.
